Name: Keen Sight
Title: Tighnari: Keen Sight
Desc: Mistakes are part of learning... However, these mistakes should be corrected upon being discovered.
Source: Reward for inviting Tighnari to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Keen Sight
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1702]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1702] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S17022]</color> once.
When your $[A1702], who has this card equipped, is affected by <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117021]</color>, the character's $[K51] costs 1 less $[K309].
(You must have $[A1702] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C117021.Name: Vijnana Suffusion
C117021.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[K51]: </color>Their $[K100] dealt will be converted to $[K107] and after the Skill DMG is finalized, summon 1 $[K1008].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K107.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>
K107.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K1008.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Clusterbloom Arrow</color>
K1008.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
